import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{ToastContainer,toast}from'react-toastify';import'react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.css';import{addClub}from'../services/api';import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AddClub=()=>{const[titleClub,setTitle]=useState('');const[descriptionClub,setDescription]=useState('');const[imageClub,setImage]=useState('');const[typeClub,setType]=useState('');const[pathClub,setPath]=useState('');const[clubAdded,setClubAdded]=useState(false);const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();let club={title:titleClub,description:descriptionClub,image:imageClub,type:typeClub,path:pathClub};return addClub(club).then(data=>data&&setClubAdded(true)).catch(err=>console.log(err));};useEffect(()=>{console.log({clubAdded});// alert("Club/Domain Added!")
clubAdded&&alert("Club/Domain Added!")&&navigate('/clubs');setInterval(()=>{setClubAdded(false);},5000);},[clubAdded]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mt-4 p-4 ",style:{width:'40%',background:'#D3D3D3'},children:[clubAdded&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ToastContainer,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Add New Club/Domain "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:e=>handleSubmit(e),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Title : "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",required:true,className:"form-control",value:titleClub,onChange:e=>setTitle(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Description : "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",required:true,className:"form-control",value:descriptionClub,onChange:e=>setDescription(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Image : "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",required:true,className:"form-control",value:imageClub,onChange:e=>setImage(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Type : "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",required:true,className:"form-control",value:typeClub,onChange:e=>setType(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Path : "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",required:true,className:"form-control",value:pathClub,onChange:e=>setPath(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn btn-secondary",children:"Submit"})})]})]});};export default AddClub;
